Package net.minecraft.network.chat

Interface Component

All Known Implementing Classes:
MutableComponent, Component
public interface Component  extends Message, net.minecraft.network.chat.FormattedText, Iterable<Component>
Represents a serialized message that can be sent to players or written to the console.
